pages.text: The Sun Collector is a special device that is able to infuse sunlight into mundane objects, like $(l:resources/quartz_sphere)Quartz Spheres$(/l). An adjacent $(item)Daylight Sensor$() is required to start collecting sunlight. The collector will absorb sunlight during the day, slowly converting Quartz Spheres to $(l:constructs/weapons/sun_grenade)Sun Grenades$(/l).
